FuncDef: The display bgp rpd peer command displays information about BGP RPD peers.
Examples: Total number of peers : 4                 Peers in established state : 1
Peer            V          AS  MsgRcvd  MsgSent  OutQ  Up/Down       State  PrefRcv
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Run the display bgp rpd peer command to display information about BGP RPD (Route Policy Distribution) peers.
